author: James Crowley
title: Jackie Chan Is Worried About Your Safety Now More Than Ever
description: The action movie icon shared an encouraging and inspiring video to Twitter urging fans to stay safe.
content:
Actor and martial-arts expert Jackie Chan is the latest actor to ask people to follow government guidelines to prevent spreading COVID-19.
In a video posted to Twitter, the Rush Hour star told fans to stay home, but wear face masks and wash their hands if th… [+2357 chars]
